data.title: L2BEAT
data.description:
## About Us

**L2BEAT** is a dedicated analytics and research platform for L2 scaling solutions. With an unwavering commitment to transparency, we strive to offer a thorough comparison of diverse Ethereum L2 systems, aiming to enlighten and empower the community with unbiased insights.

We present various non-trivial metrics and have thoroughly analyzed each L2 project to understand its technology's inner workings and associated risks. As an **impartial watchdog**, we actively monitor and contribute to the development of the L2 space.

## Our Work

**Our ongoing initiatives include:**

- 🌐 Constantly updating and adding new features to **[l2beat.com](https://l2beat.com/scaling/tvl)**
- 🛠 Releasing open-source products such as **[Earl](https://earl.fun)** or **[BYOR](https://medium.com/l2beat/build-your-own-rollup-72423f4255e7)** to support the broader developer community and encourage developer inflow into the Ethereum ecosystem
- ⚙️ Developing essential transparency tools like the **[StarkEx Explorer](https://dydx.l2beat.com)** for the L2 ecosystem
- 🎓 Organizing numerous high-quality conferences like **[L2AMSTERDAM](https://amsterdam.l2beat.com)**, **[L2WARSAW](https://warsaw.l2beat.com/)**, **[L2DAYS](https://l2days.xyz/m)**, and coordinating **[university workshops](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7116419491881754625)** to educate and grow the Ethereum community
- 🗳️ Actively and responsibly participating in the governance of projects like **Arbitrum**, **Optimism**, **Hop**, and **Uniswap**, while also participating in discussions on **[online events](https://x.com/elblockchainguy/status/1695901376356753740?s=20)** and in **[stationary meetups](https://twitter.com/l2beat/status/1681703543797841929?s=20)**
- 🔍 Actively identifying and reporting security flaws to safeguard the L2 space through our Discovery Discord tool
- 📜 Sharing insightful publications, such as our **[Upgradeability of Ethereum L2s](https://l2beat.com/multisig-report)** report

**As always, we have very ambitious plans for the future**, including introducing more metrics, enhancing our risk framework, automating monitoring, and building specialized instruments for various L2s and other projects within the Ethereum ecosystem.

## Donate

💡 By donating to this grant, you support our ongoing efforts to provide education, transparency, and valuable resources to the L2 space.

**We greatly appreciate your support. Thank you! 💗**

## About Us

**L2BEAT** is a dedicated analytics and research platform for L2 scaling solutions. With an unwavering commitment to transparency, we strive to offer a thorough comparison of diverse Ethereum L2 systems, aiming to enlighten and empower the community with unbiased insights.

answers.question: Link to your Public Group Chat (Discord or Telegram )
How is your project in support of or directly advancing the Ethereum Network’s infrastructure?
answers.answer: L2BEAT is a critical resource in the L2 ecosystem, which provides data, research, and analytics into the Ethereum scaling solutions.

answers.question: If you've participated in past grant rounds, please share any new updates or milestones from the prior months (N/A if you haven’t participated previously).
answers.answer:
L2 Space Vigilance: Ensuring the security and robustness of the L2 space by proactively detecting and reporting bugs and vulnerabilities, including the critical Proposer Failure change in Aztec Connect.

New Scaling Page Elements: Adding numerous new options for filtering projects based on their properties and introducing additional stacks in line with recent developments in the scene.

Twitter Spaces Activity: Actively participating in various online events focused on L2s, their technology, governance, and potential future, sharing our knowledge and increasing interest in development.

New Project Listings: Welcoming several new projects to our website, including Scroll, Paradex, Aevo, Manta Pacific, Honeypot, and Kroma.

Enforced Open-Source Node Requirement: Implementing our final Stages requirement, which mandates the existence of an open-source node capable of recreating the state from L1 data for all L2 projects.

BYOR (Build Your Own Rollup) Tool Update: Dedication to improving the BYOR tool, simplifying the onboarding process for all those eager to learn by building.

L2DAYS at Devconnect Istanbul: Hosting the largest L2-oriented event in 2023, with over 1500 attendees from around the world.

New TVL Framework and Subpage: Introducing a dedicated section for L2 tokens and their value calculation.

Significant Listing Milestone: Achieving over 30 active projects on our website.

Significant GitHub Milestone: Surpassing 100 contributors on the L2BEAT repository, demonstrating our commitment to fostering open-source collaboration among numerous teams and individual developers.
